Articles.Content:
Just for fun i would like to see your world names, i ussually have troubles coming up with mine, so lets see yours!

Mine 99% of the time is space-x unless im inpatiant and just leave it default
I always use career if I'm playing career mode with no video shooting. Or video if I plan on recording video out of it.

One Small Step (My very first time on KSP)

Head for the stars

Recording
like the name of your save?

like the name of your save?

Yep.

And i like one small step, i dont know why i diddent think of that

Career

Sandbox

Guess for what

default. It's unimaginative, I know, but I always know that this is my main save. I generally come up with others based upon what I'm planning to do with the new save (though I usually just stick to one universe).

BEST!!!! and CAREER!!! lol.

And when the new update comes out, I'm making a new save, called, you guessed it, BEST CAREER!!!! haha.
My ARM pack save is called Rock-et Science.

0.20: Reach for the Stars

0.21: Don't Stop

0.22: Never Give Up

0.23: Reach the Top

0.23.5: Bring it all Back to You
I have Spartan Aerospace and Rotund Rockets.

TWKSP- this is my main save, where stories happen.

Ckinen- this is where I do extra sets for stories

Comp- set up for the Kerbin Cup-

Experimentas -mucking around and stuff.

Edited June 24, 2014 by Tw1

"Hybrid" (a pre-Career Sandbox converted to Career by careful file editing, just so I could have the experience of doing Science)

"Test Sim" (Sandbox, for trying out various things before copying them to my "live" / "real" game)

career: ARM mode

sandbox: mess around mode

Linearcratic Space Empire - Career

sdassdfasdf (approximation) - Sandbox

'Barden Aerospace Technologies' - Career, highly modded save (38 mods), for anything-I-want ships

'Namso Space Dynamics' - Career, less modded save (~8 mods) for simple, mainly stock ships

'Prototype and Testing Centre' - Sandbox, all mods (45 mods) for testing ships and playing around

'BTSM' - Career, only BTSM pack, DRE and VOID, for fun and more variance

'Hark Launch Association' - Career, all stock, for simple, stock rockets that I can transfer to friends

Sandbox save: 0.23 I

Career save: 0.23 II

I don't use the first one for anything other than things that might break a save; 0.23 II is career complete for now so it's basically a sandbox save with added science features

Career - [My Name]

Sandbox - Whatever body I'm testing ships for

default- Serious-business sandbox

Career- serious-business career mode

default2- messing around sandbox

I really don't know why I kept them them with their generic names. XD

Alan Kerpard (current carreer)

Buzz Kerbdrin (sandbox)

Neil Kerbstrong (old carreer from pre-BTSM era)

Jim Kervell (old carreer, savefile FUBAR, manually recovered in Kerpard)

Sandbox: "Sand"

Career1: "Reed"

Career2: "WithMods"

Career3: "WithTAC"

...look, I am a DBA and SQL developer... I cannot be expected to be creative.
My career save is "Jeb Kerman is a steely-eyed missile man"
I named my 0.23.5 career mode save "Amalgamated Regional Militia". Fifty internet points to whoever gets it.

I named my 0.23.5 career mode save "Amalgamated Regional Militia". Fifty internet points to whoever gets it.

Is that a "known space" reference?

Anyway,

Sandbox: Jebediah X

Career: SCIENCE!

Is that a "known space" reference?

I'm slightly surprised that worked. Yeah, when they kept calling 0.23.5 "The ARM Update", I knew what I had to do.
